settings.title: School of Tomorrows AI

settings.title: Augmented Cinema – Video Mapping + AI
settings.subtitle: Design cinematic experiences that spill out of the screen and onto real space. Combine video mapping, physical environments, and AI-generated visuals in a playful, guided sprint.

settings.title: Why learning here feels different
settings.subtitle: Our courses are designed by professional developers to help you master React.js and modern web development practices.
settings.content: At School of Tomorrow's AI you don't just follow tutorials — you rehearse futures. We treat AI as a co-pilot for radical imagination. Each course blends body, space, sensors and code so you can prototype with your hands, your tools and your curiosity.

list.title: Hands-on with physical and digital prototypes
list.subtitle: Work on real-world React applications that mirror actual client projects we've delivered at Hype180.

list.title: AI as a co-pilot of imagination
list.subtitle: Learn from developers who are actively building and shipping React applications in production environments.

list.title: Projects that start simple and grow with you
list.subtitle: Master the latest React features, tools, and best practices used in professional development environments.

list.title: A safe space to experiment, fail and try...
list.subtitle: Get guidance on building your portfolio, preparing for interviews, and landing your first React developer role.

settings.title: Room for Interaction
settings.subtitle: A series where you choreograph movement, light, sensors and AI in playful, guided experiments.

settings.title: Your Path to Becoming a React Developer
settings.subtitle: Follow our structured learning path to go from beginner to professional React developer, guided by our team of experienced instructors.

list.name: Lina Lopes
list.description: Creative technologist, artist and educator. Lina has worked with digital technologies for over 15 years, combining art, technology and social impact to create meaningful experiences.

list.name: Elon Gates
list.description: Full-stack developer with expertise in React, Node.js, and modern JavaScript. Has led multiple successful client projects and loves teaching best practices.

settings.title: Common Questions About Our School Courses
settings.subtitle: Get answers to frequently asked questions about our React.js training program

questions.title: Do I need prior programming experience?
questions.content: While some JavaScript knowledge is helpful, our beginner courses start from the basics. We'll help you build a strong foundation before moving to advanced React concepts.

questions.title: How practical are the courses?
questions.content: Very practical! You'll build real projects that mirror our agency work, including e-commerce sites, dashboards, and social media applications using React.

questions.title: What support do you provide?
questions.content: You'll have access to our instructor team, weekly live Q&A sessions, a private Discord community, and code reviews for your projects.

list.name: Michael Chang
list.description: The React fundamentals course was exactly what I needed. The instructors broke down complex concepts into manageable pieces, and the hands-on projects helped cement my understanding.

list.name: Emma Wilson
list.description: Thanks to Hype180's advanced React course, I was able to level up my skills and land a senior developer position. The real-world projects were especially valuable.

list.name: Alex Thompson
list.description: The React ecosystem can be overwhelming, but Hype180's structured approach helped me master not just React, but also the surrounding tools and best practices.
